actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to authorize water resources projects for Indian River Lagoon-South and Southern Golden Gates Estates, Collier County, in the State of Florida.
short_title: Restoring the Everglades, an American Legacy Act of 2004
subjects: Federal aid to water pollution control
Federal aid to water resources development

summary.text: Restoring the Everglades, an American Legacy Act of 2004 - Authorizes the Secretary of the Army to carry out the project for the ecosystem restoration, water supply, flood control, and protection of water quality, Indian River Lagoon-South, Florida, and the project for the ecosystem restoration, Southern Golden Gate Estates, Collier County, Florida, at specified costs, after the Chief of Engineers has issued favorable reports for the projects.
